AccessControl.Description: No access control is applied, allowing any address to call the 'init' function.

ArithmeticCheck.Description: No arithmetic checks are in place to prevent underflows, making the contract vulnerable to integer underflow exploits.
ArithmeticCheck.Vulnerability: Unchecked subtraction leads to potential underflow.

FallbackFunctionality.Description: No fallback function exists, meaning the contract does not handle unexpected Ether transfers or function calls.
